name: Worm Jazz (itch)
description:
Worm Jazz is a wriggly puzzler with a unique blend of game mechanics inspired by familiar classics such as Snake 🐍 and Bomberman 💣. You take control of Mr. Mark, an earthworm with a particular fondness for smooth jazz and dapper headwear. Wiggle your way through intricate, mind-bending mazes filled with mines, wormholes and powerups! Are you able to gobble up all the food on each stage and reach the golden apple? 🍎

FEATURES

  • Over 50 challenging scenarios set in different environments
  • Discover and unlock many unique hats 🎩
  • Smooth jazz 🎷
  • Play at your own pace; no timers and unlimited undo

Worm Jazz won the grand prize at "NM i Gameplay 2020" (The Norwegian Gameplay Championships). The theme of the competition was "extra life".

Join our community of puzzlers on Discord! http://discord.gg/QjZKw2T
